import { Grid, Typography, TableCell, TableHead, TableRow, TableBody, TableContainer, Table, } from "@material-ui/core"; import formatMoney from "../lib/formatMoney"; export default function OrderItem({ items }) { return ( Image Name Quantity Price {items?.length ? items.map((item) => ( {item.name} {item.quantity} {item.price} )) : null}
); }
